trends: There have been no other sightings in Pierceton
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: bright lights appear and hover. forward and back movement
divs: Sighting DetailsHave been seeing for a week now. same location. lights appear in the distance, getting larger and hover over treetops. witnessed from outside on a deck at residence. Thought it was a star, but moved quietly forward and then back. disk like with smaller lights. the most recent sighting, there were 2 objects. stood and watched, but unable to identify.
